name: Speed em Up
description:
Welcome to Speed Em Up.

This is a small shmup made for the CGA Game Jam using the Always Faster Theme and CGA Palette 0.

All of us have had that day when your spaceships brakes fail just as you fly into an alien fleet. Can you survive?

Instructions:

Keyboard:
Move: Arrow Keys
Shoot Special: Z
Sprint: Left Shift

Controller:
Move: Left Analog
Shoot Special: A
Sprint: Right Trigger

Credits:

Art, Sound and Programming: Wynand Prinsloo

Font: Typodermic Fonts (http://typodermicfonts.com/)
